form_title.ms_form_title_llm_v1: RECORD OF IMMIGRATION ALIEN APPREHENDED OR LOCATED, Form I-213 ( (Rev. 7-1-67) UNITED STATES DEPARTMENT OF JUSTICE Immigration and Naturalization Service

full_text: RECORD OF ILLEGAL ALIEN APPREHENDED OR LOCATED (See A.M. 2790.3) -.34 for Instructions) Family Name (Capital Letters) Given Name Middle Name Sex Color of Hair Color of Eyes YEE James Wo M Gr Br Country of Citizenship Passport Number and Country of Issue File Number Height Weight Occupation J.K. & COL. U.K. #D 614882 A-18 018 390 65 11 165 Retired United States Address (Residence) (Number) (Street) (City) (State) Scars or Marks 28 HARVARD STREET, BOSTON, MASS. Nymerous moled on face Airline & Flight No. or Vessel of Arrival PAA 220, Passenger Boarded At F.B.I. No. Marital Status Dec. 19, 1965; B02, N. Y. N.Y. Single Married PIARCO, TRINIDAD, W.I. - Separated Divorced Number, Street, City, Province (State) and Country of Permanent Residence Method of Location 53 MAIN ROAD, POINT FORTIN, TRINIDAD, W. I. Other inv. efforts Birthdate Date of Action Location Code Status at Entry Status When Found JAN. 20, 1900 02-08-68 BOS B-2 Industry and other City, Province (State) and Country of Birth AR Form: (Type & No.) Length of Time Illegally in U.S. Date & Hour Lifted TAI ON VILLAGE, TOISHAN DIST. I-94 Not Lifted 20 months App./Located CHINA 2-8-68 Visa Issued At Social Security Account Name /Located (At/Near) PORT OF SPAIN, TRINIDAD None Boston 1:30 p.m. Date Visa Issued Social Security No. Send C.O. Rec. Check Apprehended/Located By To: 12-9-65 none BOS-Inv. John A. McNamara, Investigator Immigration Record Departed while in status Criminal Record Transit 1955, visitor 1962 and 1964. Visitor 1965 Claims None Name, Address, and Nationality of Spouse (Maiden Name, if appropriate) Number & Nationality of Minor Children YEE YIP, 28 Harvard St., Boston, Mass., U.K. & Colonies none Father's Name, and Nationality and Address, if Known Mother's Present and Maiden Names, Nationality. and Address, If Known YEE HO, China; deceased YEEFONG SHEE, nee FONG SHEE; China; deceased Property in U.S. Not in Immediate Possession Fingerprinted Lookout Not Listed Deportation Charge(s) (Code Words) Book None Claimed See Form 1-43 Yes No Checked Listed, Code SEMIB Name and Address of (Last) (Current) U.S. Employer From: To: None Narrative (Outline particulars under which alien located/apprehended and furnish details re time, place and manner of last entry) SUBJECT testified that he was born in China on January 20, 1900 and presently a citizen of United Kingdom and Colonies. He has been in the United States four times. He departed within his time on the first three occasions. He was last admitted at New York on December 19, 1965, as a visitor for 6 months and he did not depart. He requested his attorney to apply for an extension of his stay, but through an error the request was never submitted to this Service. He has been married twice, his first wife died and his present wife is with him and is also an overstay visitor. Voluntary departure granted to March 13, 1968. perPFC If space Insufficient, show "continued" and continue on reverse, from bottom up): mfm John A. McNama Signature and Titletar DISTRIBUTION Received (subject and documents) (report of interview) from 1 - File Officer: 19 at ( ). M. Disposition (Receiving Officer) Form I-213 (Rev. 7-1-67) UNITED STATES DEPARTMENT OF JUSTICE Immigration and Naturalization Service
